title: Children at expected level for communication and language by end of early years foundation stage

versions.title: Children at expected level for communication and language by end of early years foundation stage
versions.summary: Early years foundation stage profile outcomes of 5 year olds. Percentage at 'expected level' across all communication and language learning goals, England (state-funded schools), academic year 2022/23.
versions.description:
This dataset shows the early years foundation stage profile outcomes of 5 year olds. Percentage at 'expected level' across all communication and language learning goals, in England (state-funded schools), for academic year 2022/23.

Coverage

England (state-funded schools)

Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities,
Counties,
Regions,
Nation (England)

Source

 - England: [Department for Education]
